# oenb

[![CRAN status](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/oenb)](https://cran.r-project.org/package=oenb)
[![Travis build status](https://travis-ci.org/franzmohr/oenb.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/franzmohr/oenb)

`oenb` provides functions for the use of the statistical data webservice of the Austrian national bank (Oesterreichische Nationalbank, OeNB).

## Installation

### Development version

```{r github, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("franzmohr/oenb")
```

## Usage

```{r}
library(oenb)
```


### Table of content

```{r}
toc <- oenb_toc()
head(toc)
```

### Dataset overview

```{r}
overview <- oenb_dataset(id = "11")
head(overview)
```

### Attributes of a series

```{r}
attrib <- oenb_attributes(id = "11", pos = "VDBFKBSC217000")
attrib
```

### Data download

```{r}
series <- oenb_data(id = "11", pos = "VDBFKBSC217000")
```

### Metadata

```{r}
meta <- oenb_metadata(id = "11", pos = "VDBFKBSC217000")
meta
```
